boardgame.name: G.E.V.
GEV
boardgame.description: Microgame #8 in the Metagaming Microgames series, the original release of G.E.V. A follow-up to Ogre. Units from Ogre are carried over, with expanded rules for terrain. A larger map and more ambitious game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Second base game of the Ogre/GEV Family._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Note: Ogre and G.E.V. were later reissued separately and then repackaged together as Ogre / G.E.V. by Steve Jackson Games. The Steve Jackson GEV edition has a different countermix to the original editions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 10: Gateway games

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: DESCRIPTION: Original edition (Metagaming, 1978). Unpunched and unplayed in early plastic sleeve packaging format. A great collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;s find!

Unopened, unpunched, (I believe) original version. It is the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Microgame #8_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; version shown on the left of the attached BGG image. (I can take a pic of my own, if needed.) The outside of the plastic envelope holding the game looks a bit dirty from shelf time, but the contents look perfect from what I can see without opening it. Please feel free to ask any questions. +++ USA sales only, trades accepted worldwide
First edition. Uncut, in excellent condition.
Unpunched. Box slightly scuffed.
In original plastic wallet. Counters cut but all pieces in very good condition. Postage £1.00 in UK, £1.50 to rest of EU and £2.00 rest of the world.
In ziplock. Microgame #8

TWO Copies for the price of one! Metagaming, and Steve Jackson Games Editions. Counters are cut out, and intermixed (which is why I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling them together). You get two rule books, two maps, lots of counters. Check out my other OGRE/GEV entries. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m ALWAYS willing to consider serious counter-offers! Especially on multi-game deals.

OGRE _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; GEV the originals from STG/Metagaming.SOLD AS A PAIR ONLY $41.50.. Played once or twice and the components are in excellent condition. All 247 combined games counters are in a single ziplock and are crisp and like new. they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve been stored in this ziplock away for 25+ years. I just counted them. shipping should be cheap - like $3 US for within the US
1978 SJG pocket box edition. Counters are cut. Everything in great condition. I can only accept check, money order, or Paypal (if it is funded through a bank account, not a debit or credit card).
unpunched Original edition 1978 Microgame 8

Unpunched _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; unplayed complete Metagaming boxed 2nd edition. Counter sheets unpunched, rulebook and map as new, dice included. The box is somewhat squashed, however (see photo). The Metagaming boxes were notoriously feeble _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; this copy has obviously travelled around over the last 30 years! P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P to the UK will be £1.50.
Metagaming Microgame 8. Unpunched, complete. The box is in poor condition, but everything inside is in very good condition.

I am selling Ogre and GEV together. Both are from the MicroGame line by MetaGaming. Oger is MetaGame 1 GEV is MetaGame 8 There are 243 Counters 4 of which are train counters. The game is used and the maps and rules are in good playable condition. Contact me with any questions. I only ship on Wednesdays to the lower 48 United States. I accept PayPal and COD when F2F in the Southbay area of Los Angeles or in Irvine close to John Wayne airport. (This listing is cross listed on the Ogre market place as well)
OGRE / G.E.V. both Games in one Pack! also include is SHOCKWAVE I will send pictures on request postage Germany 5,00 EUR EUROPEAN UNION 10,00 EUR
Contains 270 chits, incompletely separated. Die not included. This is the standalone bagged edition.

SJG Pocket Box edition. The counters have been cut but are all present. The map is in very good shape. The rules have a previous owner_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s initial on the front page but are fine otherwise. The box is fine (the plastic has bled through the front label a bit, which is typical). I would prefer to sell Ogre, G.E.V., and Shockwave together.

ForTom J/Dreadnaut, ONLY - winner of game auction. This is a listing for a lot of three Ogre family games: 1 Steve Jackson Games Pocket Box edition of Ogre. 1 Steve Jackson Games edition of GEV 1 Steve Jackson Games edition of Shockwave.

Unpunched/uncut countersheet. Rules and map show no wear. No in original plastic bag, now in archival comic bag. Will ship in first class or priority envelope for $5 to U.S. addresses. $8 to Canada. $15 international. Buy a second magazine/Ziploc or Folio game and shipping is only $2 more. No additional shipping if buying 3 or more.
Uncut! But box has edge and corner wear. Like new inside. This is the 1978 edition with the orange/pink cardboard box.
2nd edition in plastic pocket box. Punched. Excellent condition except for label on back of box which looks like the glue that holds it on has stained it.

Game is complete in plastic _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;pocket box_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. All components are in very good condition. This is the original release of G.E.V. A follow-up to Ogre. Units from Ogre are carried over, with expanded rules for terrain. A larger map and more ambitious game. Pocket Box; cover art by David R. Dietrick and Dave Martin. Color map painted by Denis Loubet, black-and-white two-sided counters, rulebook. Shipping will be added if items are not picked up locally. Shipping is through USPS from zip code 22306, or as otherwise arranged with buyer. Thanks for looking!

RESERVED FOR TheGreenMan! Ogre _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; GEV bundle: Ogre (Metagaming 1st edition with single-sided counters) -- (Like New except bag has been replaced with a zip bag, Unpunched) G.E.V. (Metagaming 1st edition with single-sided counters) -- (Like New - Unpunched) G.E.V. (Steve Jackson 2nd ed pocket box) -- (Like New --partially punched) Plastic box ALSO includes Ogre Reinforcement Pack 1st ed. and Shockwave 1st ed.

Laminated map, unpunched The offered game is from Mike Bartnikowski’s collection. He passed in late 2012 and we are liquidating his gigantic (over 1200 pieces) Hoard. We have a live .xls catalog with most of the pieces, asking price and condition. To learn more, email at bartnikowskishoard@gmail.com. Shipping to be paid by buyer. We ship from 48192. paypal payments accepted at barbarakiss@sbcglobal.net
